title: Mummy Bandage, Di-sw-hepu, born of Iret-eru, son of Ptah
description:
One length of linen, with demotic writing in black ink, indiscriminately cut from a longer length.
Condition: Several holes and stain, frayed around the edges.
dimensions:
frame: 6 3/8 x 16 1/8 in. (16.2 x 41 cm)
Object: 4 15/16 x 14 13/16 in. (12.5 x 37.6 cm)
Threads per square cm: Warp: 31 x Weft: 12

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
